title: New: Novella – Mary's Gun
body:
**Novella** have always made tunes that are broad, both in terms of expression and the clear genre inspiration they conceive from.

Their new track however, **_Mary’s Gun_**, is remarkably minute in both its story telling and observations. The track centres around **Shangri-Las** lead singer Mary Weiss and her encounters with the FBI, that eventually lead to Mary carrying a gun; voila, we have a song title. Not a bad track to start a small UK tour with; check their upcoming dates below.

**_Mary’s Gun_** will be released on Italian Beach Babes on 26th November.

OCTOBER  
17 Take 5, Norwich  
18 Louisiana, Bristol  
19 Sound Control, Manchester

NOVEMBER  
16 The End Fest, Flashback Records, London  
17 The Old Blue Last, London  
30 Sixty Million Postcards, Bournemouth
